title: Bug 6304: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: The bug report lacks sufficient details in the OB (Observed Behavior), EB (Expected Behavior), and SR (Steps to Reproduce) sections.
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer, an error or unexpected behavior occurs.
EB: The synchronization process between a .java file and another resource should complete successfully without errors or unexpected behavior.
SR:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file).
3. Attempt to synchronize the selected files.
